text: Finally a luckin coffee opened near my office. It closes at 7pm during weekdays and closed during weekends. So its good enough for me. Its a small outlet but efficient enough to serve the drinks quite fast. I'm a big fan of the vouchers. Have been collecting them weekly. So far I've not paid for a full price drink before. Supportive of such a unique business model.

Like their lemonade

$8.50 for gesha dirty and grape fizzy americano

$4.25 for butter latte
My new favourite! Very happy with the efficient service and I love Luckin‚Äôs great coffee! Enjoying the discounts which urge me to get a cuppa daily before heading to work.
0.99 for the 1st cup is always nice :)
